name: Kushagra Wadhwa
job_description: We are seeking an AI/ML engineer with experience in Python, LLMs, RAG pipelines, and NLP frameworks...
summary: Passionate AI and Data Science enthusiast with a strong foundation in Python, AI/ML, and NLP frameworks. Skilled in building innovative LLM powered solutions, RAG pipelines, and automation tools. Dedicated to solving real‑world problems with cutting‑edge technologies and delivering impactful results.

education.degree: B. Tech Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

experience.title: AI Project Intern
experience.description: Developed an advanced 'Knowledge-AI' chatbot leveraging Llama Index and Gemini Embeddings, and implementing RAG pipelines, achieving accurate responses for document‑based queries.

experience.title: Data Scientist Intern
experience.description: Engineered a document parser achieving 93% document coverage across HR policy documents, including structured table and image extraction. Developed a PDF analysis dashboard for real-time metrics (page count, word count, corpus stats), improving document analysis efficiency.

projects.title: No LLM PDF Extractor
projects.description: Built a robust tool to parse unstructured documents and extract structured data without relying on large language models (LLMs). Extracts both tables and images from PDFs with high accuracy. Achieved 93% document coverage, ensuring comprehensive data retrieval.

projects.title: Sales-Assist AI
projects.description: Designed an AI‑powered conversational assistant to enhance real‑time customer interactions. Uses LLMs and Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG) to provide accurate, context‑aware responses.

certifications.title: Diploma in Programming and Data Science
